title: Castle Waiting v2 1-18 (2006-2012) [Fantagraphics]
description:
English | CBZ and CBR | 18 Issues

Castle Waiting v2 1-18 (2006-2012)
Publisher:  Fantagraphics
Publication Date:  July 2006 - November 2012

By Linda Medley

Named the Best Graphic Novel of 2010 by Johanna Draper Carlson at Comics Worth Reading.

Named to the following "best of 2010" lists: Publishers Weekly's Fifth Annual Critics Poll, Comics-and-More's Top 20 Comics of 2010, Shaenon Garrity at The Daily Cross Hatch, and Janet Lee at Robot 6.

With its long-awaited second volume, this witty and sublimely drawn fantasy eases into a relaxed comedy of manners as Lady Jain settles into her new life in Castle Waiting.

Unexpected visitors result in the discovery and exploration of a secret passageway, not to mention an epic bowling tournament. The book also includes many flashbacks that deepen the stories behind the characters, including JainÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s earliest romantic entanglements and conflicts with her bratty older sisters, the horrific past of the enigmatic Dr. Fell, and more.
